<a id="Occluder3D"></a>

# Occluder3D

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [ArrayOccluder3D](ArrayOccluder3D.md), [BoxOccluder3D](BoxOccluder3D.md), [PolygonOccluder3D](PolygonOccluder3D.md), [QuadOccluder3D](QuadOccluder3D.md), [SphereOccluder3D](SphereOccluder3D.md)

Occluder shape resource for use with occlusion culling in [OccluderInstance3D](OccluderInstance3D.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**Occluder3D** stores an occluder shape that can be used by the engine's occlusion culling system.

See [OccluderInstance3D](OccluderInstance3D.md)'s documentation for instructions on setting up occlusion culling.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Occlusion culling](../tutorials/3d/occlusion_culling.md)
